text: Hey There! I am just jumping into developing a HubSpot CMS template for a Client, wondering if HubSpot supports WebStorm or any IntelliJ IDEs ? ... Thanks!

You can use any preferred IDE that allows you to edit your files locally. I do not know all of the advanced features that webstorm and IntelliJ have but some server based functionality may not work with HubSpot. That said we have a local development CLI, that you can use in tandem with your preferred IDE, which makes managing your files on HubSpot easy.
<https://designers.HubSpot.com/tutorials/getting-started-with-local-development>
I donâ€™t have hard stats on this but based on the conversations in this community the most commonly used IDE seems to be VS Code. I personally use that as well, and it works great with HubSpot.
